content: the february socks are a top down ankle sock with a cute heart colorwork design on the cuff the cuff is shaped with short row and the heel is a heel flap and gusset construction sizes one size women s medium measurements 3 5 / 8 9cm foot width 7 / 17 8cm total circumference length is adjustable suggested yarn mc 50g fingering weight yarn for main color cc 5g fingering weight yarn for contrast color sample is knit in mc cascade heritage in the color strawberry cream 5648 75% superwash merino wool 25% nylon cc bumblebee acres farms coquette sock in the color jolly red 75% superwash corriedale 25% nylon suggested needles 2 5mm needles circular or dpns guage 33 stitches x 49 row = 4 x 4 / 10cm x 10cm additional materials 2 stitch markers optional tapestry needle techniques used german twisted cast-on increasing decreasing stranded colorwork german short row picking up stitches kitchener bind-off if you have any questions about this pattern please feel free to message me on ravelry dm me on instagram @allisonroseshaw 1 or email allisonrosecreates@gmail com if you share any pictures of work you make with this pattern on social media please tag me @allisonroseshaw 2 and use the hashtag #februarysocks - i d love to see what you make 1 https //www instagram com/allisonroseshaw/ 2 https //www instagram com/allisonroseshaw/
